Pre-Game Insights: Nepal are set to face the United States in a three-match T20I series starting October 18, 2024, at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas.
USA captain Monank Patel will lead the side, with experienced players like Andries Gous and Aaron Jones also featured.
Nepal's Rohit Paudel will captain his side, with Sandeep Lamichhane, Dipendra Singh Airee, and Sompal Kami providing key support.
USA recently reached the Super 8 stage of the 2024 T20 World Cup, defeating Pakistan and challenging India, while Nepal failed to win any matches in the same tournament.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be telecast in India on Sony Ten 5 and streamed live on FanCode app, while Nepalese fans can watch it on Kantipur Max TV.
USA fans can view the match on the Willow app.
